item.description: Contact us Feel free to connect with us at NeoMind.

Steering committee Member Role Jim Barry, MD Ryan McAdams, MD Kristyn Beam, MD Nicholas Carr, MD George El-Ferzli, MD Antonio Hernandez, MD Thomas Hooven, MD Ameena Husain, MD Lindsey Knake, MD, MS Ravi Patel, MD, MSc Alvaro Moreira, MD, MSc

Conferences Pediatric Academic Societies April 27 - May 1, 2023. Washington, D.C. American Academy of Pediatrics October 20 - 24, 2023. Washington, D.C. American Medical Informatics Association November 15 - 23, 2023. New Orleans, LA.

Purpose Our purpose is to leverage the power of artificial intelligence (AI) to enhance the quality and precision of clinical care for neonates. As a team of experienced neonatologists, we are committed to advancing the field through the development and implementation of innovative AI-based tools and techniques that improve patient outcomes, increase efficiency, and reduce healthcare costs. Through collaboration with our peers, industry partners, and other stakeholders, we strive to create a more personalized and effective approach to neonatal care that benefits patients, families, and healthcare providers.

Presentations - Podcasts - Lectures Speaker Title Month/Year Slides Video Audio Anthony Chang MD, MBA, MPH, MS Keynote on Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare July 2020 iCAN Summit Ryan McAdams MD Acadicus VR Roundtable May 2021 Acadicus
